name: Baseball Stars Color
description:
The colorized version of 'Baseball Stars' (Neo Geo Pocket), 'Baseball Stars Color' is a baseball-themed sports game specially designed for the Neo Geo Pocket Color. Unlike its uncolorized counterpart, which was met only within Japan and Europe borders, this edition was also released into North America. It was developed and published by SNK on March 19th, 1999.

Take a swing and make for the home run- you're the leading team player this round! Supervise the greatest team of baseball stars once more, in this completely colored and refined edition of the original- with bonus unlockable players! Lead your personalized team to victory, as you take into account certain statistics and enemy tactics. You can even strike it off with a friend, to prove whose league and skill conquers the field. Wrap it up with completing the champion's campaign, and become the best coach there ever was!
